error.title: Error
error.message: We could not find what you were looking for. Please try again

safety.title: Error
safety.message: The system has identified that the content you are searching for may be unsafe, and the search has been blocked. We suggest creating a different activity.

google.title: Error
google.message: The login failed. Please ensure you are connected to the internet and try again

notSaved.title: Error
notSaved.message: The action was not saved, please try again
